featured.text: Norwegians were prohibited from wearing any 38 of their national unity, such as buttons with the initials of their king.

definition.zh_def: 按鈕是一種用於啟動或控制設備的機械或電子裝置。
definition.en_def: A button is a mechanical or electronic device used to start or control a machine or system.
definition.example: She pressed the button to start the coffee maker.
